WorkItem.ClosedComment: You need the blue gem to activate your meta.
WorkItem.Description:
I currently have this equipped with a Delicate Cardinal Ruby +20 AGI and 22 AGI enchant which produces ~449 dps.
The optimizer shows me that if I replace my gem with a Shifting Dreadstone +10 AGI and +15 STA, with the same enchant, the dps produced will jump to ~616.
Â 
How is this possible as their seems to be a net loss of 6 AGI?

Comments.Message: oh yeah.  this is using the most current version of rawr2 and 3 beta

Can you please attach your char file? Without it I can't check what happens in your specific setup.
Please also say what the socket bonus according to your Rawr is. As it's a blue socket it could be that it's trying to get a wrong socket bonus, if it for example has the socket bonus at 40 Agi instead of 4 the gem swap would indeed be worth it due to the incorrect socket bonus.
both say +4 agi.  delicate is not getting bonus shifting is
Oh my.  Looking at the big picture are we?  Too funny.  Thanks.  So wasn't paying attention to that.
